mapper.select: SELECT PROJECT_ID, TEST_ID, TEST_NM, TEST_STTG_DATE, TEST_ENDG_DATE, TEST_BIGO, DEL_FLAG FROM TEST_MANAGEMENT WHERE PROJECT_ID = #{PROJECT_ID} ORDER BY TEST_STTG_DATE ASC

SELECT PROJECT_ID, TEST_ID, SCENARIO_ID, SCENARIO_NM, START_DATE, END_DATE, DEL_FLAG FROM SCENARIO WHERE PROJECT_ID=#{PROJECT_ID} AND TEST_ID=#{TEST_ID}
AND SCENARIO_ID =#{SCENARIO_ID}

SELECT PROJECT_ID, CASE_ID,TEST_ID, SCENARIO_ID, CASE_NM, CASE_STATUS, START_DATE, END_DATE, DEL_FLAG FROM CIRCUMSTANCE WHERE PROJECT_ID=#{PROJECT_ID} AND TEST_ID=#{TEST_ID} AND SCENARIO_ID=#{SCENARIO_ID}

SELECT PROJECT_ID, TEST_ID, SCENARIO_ID, CASE_ID, STEP_ID, STEP_NM, START_DATE, END_DATE, DEL_FLAG FROM STEP WHERE PROJECT_ID=#{PROJECT_ID} AND TEST_ID = #{TEST_ID} AND SCENARIO_ID=#{SCENARIO_ID} AND CASE_ID=#{CASE_ID}
SELECT DISTINCT S.TEST_ID FROM USERINFO AS U, STEP_ACTION AS S WHERE USERID =#{USERID} AND U.USERID =S.TESTER_ID
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO TEST_MANAGEMENT ( PROJECT_ID, TEST_ID, TEST_NM, TEST_STTG_DATE, TEST_ENDG_DATE, TEST_BIGO,DEL_FLAG ) VALUES( #{PROJECT_ID}, #{TEST_ID}, #{TEST_NM}, #{TEST_STTG_DATE}, #{TEST_ENDG_DATE}, #{TEST_BIGO}, #{DEL_FLAG} )

INSERT INTO SCENARIO ( PROJECT_ID, TEST_ID, SCENARIO_ID, SCENARIO_NM, START_DATE, END_DATE, DEL_FLAG, SCENARIO_SEQ ) VALUES( #{PROJECT_ID}, #{TEST_ID}, #{SCENARIO_ID}, #{SCENARIO_NM}, #{START_DATE}, #{END_DATE}, #{DEL_FLAG}, NEXT VALUE FOR SCENARIO_SEQ )

INSERT INTO CIRCUMSTANCE ( PROJECT_ID, TEST_ID, SCENARIO_ID, START_DATE, END_DATE, CASE_ID, CASE_NM, DEL_FLAG ) VALUES( #{PROJECT_ID}, #{TEST_ID}, #{SCENARIO_ID}, #{START_DATE}, #{END_DATE}, #{CASE_ID}, #{CASE_NM}, #{DEL_FLAG} )

INSERT INTO STEP( PROJECT_ID, TEST_ID, DETAIL_EXPLAN, EXPLAN, STEP_ID, CASE_ID, SCENARIO_ID, STEP_NM, START_DATE, END_DATE, DEL_FLAG ) VALUES( #{PROJECT_ID}, #{TEST_ID}, #{DETAIL_EXPLAN}, #{EXPLAN}, #{STEP_ID}, #{CASE_ID}, #{SCENARIO_ID}, #{STEP_NM}, #{START_DATE}, #{END_DATE}, #{DEL_FLAG} )
mapper.select: SELECT CHAR(NEXT VALUE FOR TEST_SEQ) AS TEST_SEQ FROM DUAL
SELECT CHAR(NEXT VALUE FOR SCENARIO_SEQ) AS SCENARIO_SEQ FROM DUAL
SELECT CHAR(NEXT VALUE FOR CASE_SEQ) AS CASE_SEQ FROM DUAL
SELECT CHAR(NEXT VALUE FOR STEP_SEQ) AS STEP_SEQ FROM DUAL
SELECT TEST_NM, TEST_ID FROM TEST_MANAGEMENT WHERE PROJECT_ID =#{PROJECT_ID}

SELECT DISTINCT S.TESTER_ID, M.TEST_NM, M.TEST_STTG_DATE, M.TEST_ENDG_DATE, M.PROJECT_ID, M.TEST_ID FROM TEST_MANAGEMENT AS M, STEP_ACTION AS S WHERE M.TEST_ID = S.TEST_ID AND S.TESTER_ID =#{TESTER_ID} AND M.PROJECT_ID =#{PROJECT_ID}

SELECT DISTINCT S.TEST_ID, S.SCENARIO_ID, S.SCENARIO_NM, S.START_DATE, S.END_DATE FROM SCENARIO AS S, STEP_ACTION AS A WHERE S.SCENARIO_ID=A.SCENARIO_ID AND S.TEST_ID = A.TEST_ID AND A.TEST_ID =#{TEST_ID} AND A.TESTER_ID =#{TESTER_ID} AND S.PROJECT_ID=#{PROJECT_ID}

SELECT DISTINCT S.TEST_ID, S.SCENARIO_ID, S.SCENARIO_NM, S.START_DATE, S.END_DATE, S.DEL_FLAG FROM SCENARIO AS S, STEP_ACTION AS A WHERE S.SCENARIO_ID =A.SCENARIO_ID AND S.TEST_ID = A.TEST_ID AND A.TEST_ID =#{TEST_ID} AND A.TESTER_ID =#{TESTER_ID} AND S.PROJECT_ID =#{PROJECT_ID} AND S.DEL_FLAG ='N' AND A.DEL_FLAG ='N'

SELECT DISTINCT C.TEST_ID, C.SCENARIO_ID, C.CASE_ID, C.CASE_NM, C.START_DATE, C.END_DATE, C.DEL_FLAG FROM CIRCUMSTANCE AS C, STEP_ACTION AS S WHERE C.CASE_ID = S.CASE_ID AND C.SCENARIO_ID =S.SCENARIO_ID AND C.TEST_ID =S.TEST_ID AND C.PROJECT_ID =#{PROJECT_ID} AND C.TEST_ID =#{TEST_ID} AND C.SCENARIO_ID =#{SCENARIO_ID} AND S.TESTER_ID =#{TESTER_ID} AND S.DEL_FLAG ='N' AND S.DEL_FLAG ='N'

SELECT DISTINCT S.TEST_ID, S.SCENARIO_ID, S.CASE_ID, S.STEP_ID, S.STEP_NM, S.START_DATE, S.END_DATE, S.DEL_FLAG FROM STEP AS S, STEP_ACTION AS T WHERE S.CASE_ID = T.CASE_ID AND S.SCENARIO_ID=T.SCENARIO_ID AND S.TEST_ID =T.TEST_ID AND S.STEP_ID =T.STEP_ID AND S.TEST_ID=#{TEST_ID} AND S.SCENARIO_ID=#{SCENARIO_ID} AND S.CASE_ID=#{CASE_ID} AND T.TESTER_ID=#{TESTER_ID} AND S.DEL_FLAG='N' AND T.DEL_FLAG='N'
